message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I can only pay up to $10000 for it. I hope this revised price works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but $10000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $15000 to meet your needs. This is a fair price considering the product's value. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to go up to $12000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
